mapper.select: SELECT url FROM menutree menu RIGHT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT rp.perid FROM role_per rp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM user_role ur WHERE ur.userid=#{userId} AND rp.roleid=ur.roleid )) a ON menu.id=a.perid WHERE menu.parentId != '0' and menu.type = 1 ORDER BY sn

SELECT id, text, url, iconCls FROM menutree menu RIGHT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT rp.perid FROM role_per rp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM user_role ur WHERE ur.userid=#{userId} AND rp.roleid=ur.roleid )) a ON menu.id=a.perid ORDER BY sn
SELECT id, text, url, iconCls FROM menutree menu WHERE id IN (SELECT DISTINCT rp.perid FROM role_per rp WHERE rp.roleid = #{roleId}) ORDER BY sn
SELECT id, text, url, iconCls ,parentId FROM menutree menu WHERE menu.enabled = 1 ORDER BY sn
SELECT id, text, url, iconCls, parentId FROM menutree menu WHERE menu.enabled = 1 and menu.parentId = #{pid} and menu.type = #{type} ORDER BY sn
SELECT id, text, url, iconCls, parentId FROM menutree menu WHERE menu.enabled = 1 and menu.id = #{id} ORDER BY sn
